Reviews.Title: security stickers
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Great  stickers  ----THEY  STICK  GREATBUTDO NOT PUT THEM  OUTSIDE,  OR IN DIRECT  SUNLIGHT ????????They  Fade out in less than 2 weeks  in  the sunlight....I contacted  vendor and she sent me  new ones for  free..I put clear packing tape over the sticker.( so not to fade)... DID NOT WORK...It lasted about a month and half to two months with the clear tape over them...They  fade  againNO  GOODARE YOU KIDDING  ME?????

ProductInfo.Features:
These Decals can be applied to any smooth surface
Easily posted and removed
These signs are your first line of defense against criminals
This is the quick, easy way to warn criminals that they are being watched
Size: 6 of 3 x 2 inch and 1 of 11.5"x8.3" stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 7 Pack of Security Warning Signs Stickers Surveillance Alarm Decals for Home CCTV DVR Video Camera System CLT
